alumniConnectionContent: Amanda Sheaffer will provide content later. Build lifelong bonds through reunions, regional meetups, and mentoring that keeps MNPS alumni connected to each other and to today's students.
alumniStoriesContent: Amanda Sheaffer will provide content later. Celebrate the journeys of graduates by spotlighting their achievements, career paths, and the impact they continue to make across our city.
futuresFundedContent: Amanda Sheaffer will provide content later. Fuel scholarships, classroom grants, and student programs that open doors and give the next generation the resources to thrive.
